column4: hi, I can't compile kde 3.5 from svn nor amarok from svn after upgrading from hoary->breezy
here's the error msg of make
after doing some searching, it seems that there was libXcursor.la file in hoary, but not in breezy
what is this on the compile of specifically?
that's fine. There doesn't seem to be a package in ubuntu that brings in that library. Hm
it should ideally come in libxcursor-dev
that's where it came in hoary
might be worth just grabbing the .la and placing it inside usr/lib
yeah, but how I can make that file?
grab the hoary pack, then just take the .la from there
well, make seems to accept the old versions (from hoary pkgs) of those files, we'll see how it will work
